name: Farm Escape
description:
Strange farming game I made following the release of Unity 5. Figured I'd put a test build here. The objective is to collect money to escape the farmlands by nightfall, and you do this by growing and selling wheat.

UPDATE 7/16/15:

Apparently, my game has gotten a lot of attention recently (Thanks to CRYSTAL CHANNEL for the publicity!), so I'm making a few updates now and then.
